title: cmd/gc: wrong error if only some return values are named
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://play.golang.org/p/lDIeFp5sR4

What is the expected output?

some kind of error about only one return value being named

What do you see instead?

prog.go:12: cannot use foo literal (type foo) as type Foo in assignment:
	foo does not implement Foo (wrong type for Foo method)
		have Foo() (error, error)
		want Foo() (int, error)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

tip

same on the playground
